comment.text: The "ChoosePortal" translation key is used to display a title when choosing an authentication portal. It appears as a central heading in a login or greeting component, indicating that the user needs to select their preferred portal for authentication.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation '他のを選択してください' (Hoka no o sentaku shite kudasai) translates to 'Please select another'. While technically conveying a choice, it doesn't directly translate to 'Choose your portal'. It implies choosing *another* option, which isn't the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like 'ポータルを選択してください' (Po-ta-ru o sentaku shite kudasai), which directly translates to 'Choose your portal'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ເລືອກປະຕູທາງຂອງທ່ານ" is a literal translation, "Choose your portal" implies a specific online platform or access point.  "ປະຕູທາງ" (doorway) might be too literal and less clear in this context. A better translation would convey the idea of selecting a platform or access point.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ເລືອກເວທີຂອງທ່ານ (Leuak weti khong khun) - This translates to 'Choose your platform'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While technically correct, 'Alegeți portalul dvs' is a slightly unnatural phrasing. 'Alegeți portalul dumneavoastră' would be more common and formal, which aligns better with the likely context of a user interface element.

The translation "ඔබේ ද්වාරය තෝරන්න" (obae dvaaraya thoranna) literally translates to 'Choose your door'. While 'portal' and 'door' can sometimes be used metaphorically, 'portal' typically implies a gateway to online services or a specific platform. A more accurate translation would capture this meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a translation like "ඔබේ පිවිසුම තෝරන්න" (obae pivisuma thoranna) which translates to 'Choose your access/entry' or "ඔබේ වේදිකාව තෝරන්න" (obae vedikaawa thoranna) which translates to 'Choose your platform'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "选择另一个" (xuǎn zé lìng yī gè) translates to "Choose another" which doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Choose your portal." It implies choosing something different rather than selecting a portal.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 选择门户 (xuǎn zé mén hú) - This translates to "Choose portal" which is a more accurate reflection of the English source.
